name: TicTacToe Multiplayer Project in C#
description:
TicTacToe multiplayer game in C#

Full project with Server/Client code.

You have to open the  port 12000 in your router(you can change this), run the server. Type your public ip in the client code where "YOUR IP HERE" line is then play as the youtube video shows. You can send the client to your friends and play against them while the server is running.

 This is just to help others understand the TCP/IP class in C# a bit more.

If you found it useful, please donate. Thank You.

Check out my other game too!
